definition: to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: As long for having fair can behind my Lao each family industry, old second, do anew how?
sentences.chinese: 只要有才能繼我勞傢傢業，老二來做又怎麼了？

sentences.english: I couldn't think of a good excuse though, and I didn't want to deen rude.
sentences.chinese: 一來我想不到什麼好藉口，二來我也不想失禮。
